about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed BNSF Railway - SD70MAC Executive Patch model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise.

Features Include

  • Night Lighting
  • Ditch Lights
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Fan Animation
  • Custom Cab
  • Animated Wipers
detailed_description:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed BNSF Railway - SD70MAC Executive Patch model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise.

Features Include

  • Night Lighting
  • Ditch Lights
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Fan Animation
  • Custom Cab
  • Animated Wipers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
